feed.title: Shiyu Wu’s Hyperspace
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: 荒岛唱片
entry.content:
Just to name a few

  • 万能青年旅店 - 万能青年旅店
  • 花火 - 汪峰
  • 解决 - 崔健
  • 台风 - 野外合作社
  • 静听精彩十三首 - 许美静
  • 天空 - 王菲
  • Rumours - Fleetwood Mac
  • Hotel California - Eagles
  • Die Mensch Maschine - Kraftwerk
  • Unknown Pleasures - Joy Division
  • Heroes - David Bowie
  • Wish You Were Here - Pink Floyd
  • Remain in Light - Talking Head
  • Stop Making Sense - Talking Head
  • Rage Against the Machine - Rage Against the Machine
  • Damnation - Opeth
  • Metropolis Pt. 2: Scenes from a Memory - Dream Theater
  • Perfect Strangers - Deep Purple
  • Heaven or Las Vegas - Cocteau Twins
  • Brothers in Arms - Dire Straits
  • Venus Isle - Eric Johnson
  • Hemispheres - Rush
  • Offramp - Pat Metheny Group
  • Hot Rats - Frank Zappa
  • What’s Going On - Marvin Gaye
  • Return to Forever - Chick Corea
